gems.name: rtfm-filemanager
gems.info: A full featured terminal browser with syntax highlighted files, images shown in the terminal, videos thumbnailed, etc. You can bookmark and jump around easily, delete, rename, copy, symlink and move files. RTFM has a a wide range of other features. New in 2.4: Added archive creation (key=Z) and extraction (key=z). New in 2.5: fzf integration via Ctrl-L. New in 2.6: navi integration via ctrl-n (2.6.1 added a feature list in the Readme.md)
